scripts.scripts:prettier: prettier --write --loglevel warn "./**/*.js" && echo "Completed: Prettier for Scripts"
scripts.scripts:watch: nodemon -e js --watch theme_components/js --exec "npm run scripts && npx browser-sync reload"
scripts.scripts: npm run clean:scripts && npm run scripts:prettier && npm run scripts:webpack && npm run scripts:modernizr && echo "Completed: Scripts Task"
scripts.styles:prettier: prettier --write --loglevel warn ./theme_components/sass/**/*.scss && echo "Completed: Prettier for Styles"
scripts.styles:lint: npm run styles:prettier && npm run styles:stylelint
scripts.styles:rename: ls ./assets/css | grep -Ev "\.min.css|.map" | xargs -I '{}' basename '{}' .css | xargs -I '{}' mv ./assets/css/{}.css ./assets/css/{}.min.css
scripts.styles:watch: nodemon -e scss --watch theme_components/sass --exec "npm run styles && npx browser-sync reload"
scripts.styles: npm run clean:styles && npm run styles:lint && npm run styles:sass && npm run styles:rename && npm run styles:postcss && npm run styles:cleanup && echo "Completed: Styles Task"
scripts.static:assets:watch: nodemon -e png,jpg,jpeg,gif,xml,svg,webmanifest,ico,ttf,otf,woff,eot,woff2 --watch theme_components/icons --watch theme_components/fonts --exec "npm run static:assets && npx browser-sync reload"
scripts.static:assets: cp -r ./theme_components/fonts ./assets/ && cp -r ./theme_components/icons ./assets/ && echo "Completed: Static Assets Copy "
scripts.phpcs:watch: nodemon -e php --exec "npm run phpcs && npx browser-sync reload"
scripts.phpcs: echo "Starting PHPCS & PHPCBF Tasks" && npm run phpcs:fix && npm run phpcs:lint
scripts.images:mogrify:check: command -v mogrify >/dev/null 2>&1 && npm run images:optimize || { echo "Run 'brew install imagemagick' first. Or use your package manager to install imagemagick. Images will be copied but not optimized." >&2; return; }
scripts.images:optimize: find ./assets/images -type f | grep -E "png|jpg|jpeg" | xargs -I '{}' mogrify -strip -resize '1500x1500>' -quality 70 '{}' && echo "Completed: Image Optimizations"
scripts.images:watch: nodemon -e jpg,jpeg,png,gif,svg --watch theme_components/images --exec "npm run images && npx browser-sync reload"
scripts.images: npm run clean:images && npm run images:copy && npm run images:mogrify:check
scripts.build:message:
echo "
It might appear as if the tasks are running out of order, 
but they are running in parallel. This speeds up builds x2.
"
scripts.build:
npm run build:message && npm run clean && mkdir -p ./assets/ && npm run static:assets & npm run scripts & npm run styles & npm run images & wait && echo "
Build Complete"
scripts.build:pro: npm run build && mkdir -p ../wp-foundation-six-build && ls | grep -Ev "node|gulp|workspace|webpack|postcss|package|modernizr|theme_components|pnpm|todo" | xargs -I '{}' cp -r '{}' ../wp-foundation-six-build/
scripts.serve: npm run livereload & npm run watch
scripts.watch:code: npm run scripts:watch & npm run styles:watch
scripts.watch:all: npm run scripts:watch & npm run styles:watch & npm run static:assets:watch & npm run phpcs:watch & npm run images:watch
scripts.watch: npm run scripts:watch & npm run styles:watch & npm run static:assets:watch & npm run images:watch
